html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-06382012-05-17,  HC,  ,  , 
ActFood and Drugs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Food and Drug Regulations (1599 – Food Additive)
PrecisRegulations Amending the FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS (1599 - FOOD ADDITIVE) in order to (1) allow the use of a new food additive, calcium acid pyrophosphate, in baking powder and in unstandardized foods as an acid-reacting material and (2) to correct an inconsistency in the terminology by replacing the title preceding Table X to section B.16.100 of the French version.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2012-0103 Publication Date: 2012-06-06
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Food and Drug Regulations (1599 – Food Additive)
precis: Regulations Amending the FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS (1599 - FOOD ADDITIVE) in order to (1) allow the use of a new food additive, calcium acid pyrophosphate, in baking powder and in unstandardized foods as an acid-reacting material and (2) to correct an inconsistency in the terminology by replacing the title preceding Table X to section B.16.100 of the French version.
